column1: Smoque BBQ////I had a pulled-pork sandwich and it was DELICIOUS
column2: so tender and succulent.  Wish I'd ordered the half portion though
column3: because they give you a stupid amount of food.  Seriously
column4: I've been known to put away my share of BBQ
column5: but those portions are ridiculously huge.  Their sauce is sweet but very good.
